[[Shareware]], [[Nagware]] | working_state = | supported_platforms = | updatemodel = | package_manager = }} '''Linpus Linux''' is a [[Fedora (operating system)|Fedora]]-based [[operating system]] created by the [[Taiwan]]ese firm Linpus Technologies Inc.[http://distrowatch.com/table.php?distribution=linpus Linpus Distrowatch article] Linpus was designed specifically to fully support the Asian market, with full [[Unicode]] support for the Chinese and Japanese languages. A special version, '''Linpus Lite''', was written to run on devices with lower-cost hardware such as [[netbook]]s. It has both an icon and tab-based "Simple mode", designed for new users; and, a conventional style "PC mode" for those wanting a more [[Microsoft Windows]]-like interface. It is targeted at handheld devices with smaller screens, and supports resolutions as low as [[VGA]] (640Ã480).[http://www.thecodingstudio.com/opensource/linux/screenshots/index.php?linux_distribution_sm=Linpus%209.4%20Lite Screenshots of Linpus Lite's "easy mode" and "desktop mode"] The [[Acer Inc.|Acer]] [[Aspire One]] and Norhtec Gecko[http://eeepc.itrunsonlinux.com/the-news/1-latest-news/249-acer-aspire-one-linpus-linux-lite-recovery-dvd-online Acer Aspire One Linpus Linux Lite recovery DVD online][http://www.linuxdevices.com/news/NS7223327753.html Low-cost laptop runs Linpus Linux] [[netbook]]s come with Linpus Lite Linux pre-installed, there is also a version of the [[AspireRevo|Acer Revo]] 3610 with Linpus Linux pre-installed. A version for normal desktop computers and servers is also available, as well as a Multimedia version called Linpus Media Center. The Media Center version offers an "Upgrade pack" to purchase [[software patent|patent]] licenses from [[MPEG-LA]] for [[DVD]], [[MP3]], [[WMV]] and a few other [[codec]]s. ==Nagware== The Linpus system contains not only the [[free and open source software|free and open source]] operating system, but also Acer-specific "[[shareware]]" - users classify this as "[[nagware]]," because it asks you to register on Acer's website and purchase a full version.{{Citation needed|date=July 2009}} The fact that the Acer distribution contains this software that is not available in [[source code]] prevents the system from being considered a fully [[Free software|free]]/open operating system. == See also == *[[EasyPeasy]] ==References == {{reflist}} == External links == *[http://www.linpus.com/ Official Linpus Linux website] {{Linux distributions}} [[Category:RPM-based Linux distributions]] [[Category:Linux distributions used in appliances]] {{technology-stub}} [[ar:ÙÙÙØ¨Ø³ ÙÙÙÙØ³]] [[de:Linpus Linux]] [[es:Linpus Linux]] [[fr:Linpus Linux]] [[ko:ë¦°í¼ì¤ ë¦¬ëì¤]] [[it:Linpus]] [[nl:Linpus]] [[pl:Linpus]] [[ru:Linpus Linux]] [[fi:Linpus Linux]] [[th:Linpus Linux]] [[zh:Linpus Linux]]
